content: MT-C-GS A OC Angle bracket Adjustable, braced angle bracket for girder and strut channel structures subject to 3D loading, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – one-step assembly using Hilti MT-TFB thread-forming bolts Adjustable – cloud holes enable height adjustment in 5mm increments Adaptable – unlike welding, angle brackets allow you to modify strut channel framing during installation and for future MEP requirements Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Right-angle connections between any MT girders or strut channels Assembling metal framing for MEP support structures when resistance to 3D stresses is required Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use Material thickness: 3 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use | Material thickness | 3 mm | Weight | 0.9 lb | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2272068 - Angle connector MT-C-GS A OC adjustable - Package Size 10 pc
